wybug_title: ITPUB某分站测试文件导致后台管理密码侧漏
wybug_detail:

resource(1) of type (mysql link) resource(2) of type (mysql result) array(15) { ["id"]=> string(1) "1" ["username"]=> string(5) "admin" ["password"]=> string(32) "3aa044d4e4688be716026137d0d675ad" ["realname"]=> string(0) "" ["group_id"]=> string(1) "1" ["email"]=> string(15) "admin@admin.com" ["qq"]=> string(1) "0" ["notebook"]=> string(0) "" ["mobile"]=> string(0) "" ["telephone"]=> string(0) "" ["last_login_ip"]=> string(14) "114.252.93.133" ["last_login_time"]=> string(10) "1442407636" ["login_count"]=> string(2) "88" ["status_is"]=> string(1) "Y" ["create_time"]=> string(10) "1409192060" }
